channel.title: The NHS on TalkAboutBrex
channel.description: Recent content in The NHS on TalkAboutBrex

item.title: EU migrants use the NHS less
item.description: Most EU migrants are young and healthy and so are less likely to use NHS.

item.title: There will be less money for NHS
item.description: Nearly all economists say we will be poorer after Brexit and so we are not going to get the extra Â£350 million a week for the NHS that we were promised. Even Nigel Farage said he could not guarantee we would get that money.

item.title: We need EU people to work in NHS
item.description: 62,000 people from the EU currently work in the NHS. But the NHS is still short of 35,000 nurses and nearly 10,000 doctors. What would we do without the doctors and nurses from the EU?

item.title: We rely on EU for medicine
item.description: The UK imports 37 million packs of medicine each month from the EU. Some medicine don’t keep for long so we need them to get here quickly and regularly.
